QuestData.Title: Warforged Seals
QuestData.Description: Greetings, $n. I am privileged to offer you an excellent opportunity. Through the centuries, we've honed a method by which the very laws of chance themselves can be bent. With a Warforged Seal, valuable artifacts will find their way into your hands more frequently as you pursue Garrosh and his forces.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Lesser Charms of Good Fortune.
QuestData.RewardText: May the stars smile upon you, $n.
